> "Keep me updated of your progress" said hydras by comlink

"Yes Sir." Cyclonus said in reply on the comlink as he entered the
research center that Hydras had wanted him to secure. It was a mass of
computer banks and relays, observation rooms, medical beds and a host
of other things. Cyclonus took a moment to look around, Rodimus
comming in right behind him.

Rodimus glowered, obviously unhappy about being here, and being
ordered about by Cyclonus, his fists were balled and his stride was
agressive and quick.

Cyclonus looked over at him, his optics never really leaving the more
excitable mech. "I have given you all that you need to know about the
Ark." Cyclonus said, his voice calm and unruffled, sounding like he
was talking about the weather rather than worrying about wether
Rodimus would attack him or not. "I'm sure Hydras could use you in the
security section with him."

Rodimus nodded, "Yes, RIGHT!" he said as he glanced around the room,
as if he didn't quite trust Cyclonus. "But if you betray us, then you
will have to answer to ME!" He said, his voice all agression and anger
again.

Cyclonus turned to face Rodimus fully, "Of course." he said, his face
still calm, although there was a trace of something that flitted
across his face for a moment - anger? annoyance? humor? It was
difficult to tell. "I would expect nothing less of you." Cyclonus said
as he pointedly turned his back to Rodimus, a dismissal of a sort.

Rodimus just glared at Cyclonus, and for a long moment considered
taking out his gun and just blasting the ex-minion in the back. But
finally he just shook his head and left the room, the door slamming
shut behind him.

Cylonus just shook his head, a slight smile appearing on his face,
"Perhaps there is hope for the boy yet." he said as he began work on
upgrading the security of the room.

Preston
